Release.Changes:
Release v0.60.9:

There are multiple DLC programs in the works, but none are ready yet. So stay tuned. Meanwhile, there's something else new to play with...

- Added support for wired OEM controllers. (wired Pro Controller and wired Joycon)
- Fly Spot Reset now supports Hyperspace wild zones. (credit Gin)
- Added Helioptile Hunter using weather detection. (credit Icaroto)
- Re-added Sewer Hunter which was accidentally disabled in the last release.
- Keyboard controls have been rewritten for some future plans. If you have custom keyboard mappings, you will need to redo them.
- Fixed battles sometimes not picking a move - affecting Jacinthe Farmer. (reported by jojoaman and kichi)
- Fixed duration fields jumping the cursor around. (reported by bgoproton)

Wired OEM controllers were actually released in the previous version (v0.60.8). But the wiki wasn't ready for it at the time. So it is being announced as part of this release.

Beta.Changes:
Version 0.59.5:

- The Restaurant Farmer can now automatically select moves based on type effectiveness.
- Hopefully fixed more Restaurant Farmer hangs. (reported by numerous people)
- Bench Sit should be less CPU resource intensive. (reported by dlewis3040)

Version 0.59.4:

- The Restaurant Farmer now has a button to stop after the current run.
- More fixes to the Restaurant Farmer. (reported by elitheguy, frostedgeulleisia, and mendedpearl)
